arabic.title: أبعد مكان
text: ورا موجو بحر و شمس و ليل
و بحر و شمس و ليل

english.title: A Place So Far Away
text: Thinking about that far away place
Behind waves, sea, sun and night
The farthest forest, the farthest torrent
Is to run away, to forget
The farthest forest, the farthest torrent

english.title: The farthest place
text: - Man: So, what have you done? did you meed "Saleh"?
- He told you, mmm! to sing in Arabic. Right?
= No, it's not good at all.
= We don't have any Arabic songs.
- No, I remember that you have this song... traveling too far, something like that!!
Lost his way among the crowds
in where he forgets what already left
beyond waves, sea, sun and night
the farthest woods and the farthest torrent
to run away and to forget troubles
beyond waves and sea and sun and night
the farthest woods and the farthest torrent
